page.title: 12 Lord Hertford's Estate
page.content: The title of the Marquis of Hertford as been owned by the Seymour family since the 18th century.Today,Hugh Seymour has the title making him the 8th Marquis of Hertford.The Marquis and his family live in Ragley Hall,which is about 1 and a half miles away from Alcester.The Hall has been open to the public since 1948,and about 80 000 tourists visit it each year.The Marquis and his family live in the rooms open to the public,as well as their own private quarters.The money from the public provides the money needed to run the Hall and its grounds.In fact 90% of the Marquis's intake is from tourists, and the other 10% is from the woodland and farms.The most famous part of the house is the mural called 'The Temptation' which was painted by 1 man, over a period of 13 and a half years.
